attributes.additional_details: Citizens deserve the right to defend themselves. Legalizing pepper spray gives a non-lethal, effective way to prevent attacks, especially against women, and reduces serious injuries.
attributes.background: Pepper spray is a non-lethal self-defense tool that can help prevent attacks, especially on women at night. We urge the government to legalize its regulated sale and possession for personal safety.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition, which calls for a similar action: "Make it legal to carry regulated non-lethal self-defence products" https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/743664
